posts.title: Desing and implementation of a full stack web application (Flask, python, HTML) to interact with DL process analytics models.
posts.abstract: Machine learning models for anomaly detection at the university were only python code accessible by the terminal. I developed a full stack web interface to easily interact with them and showcase the result to non-technical stackeholders.
